waypoints.onload:
speed("on") if not __WPL.ResumePoint then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(1) end
function ShabbyBag() if getQuestStatus(425028) ~= "complete" then print("Scanning for Shabby Bags") bag = player:findNearestNameOrId(120662) -- Shabby Bag if bag and 250 > distance(bag.X, bag.Z, player.X, player.Z) then player:moveTo(CWaypoint(bag.X, bag.Z), true) yrest(500) player:target_Object(120662) inventory:update() inventory:useItem(241060) RoMScript("AcceptBorderQuest()") -- Lost and Found RoMScript("CloseAllWindows()") end end end
waypoints.waypoint: __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL")

player:dismount() __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN") if getQuestStatus(425034) == "incomplete" then repeat player:target_Object(120429) -- Research Equipment rest(2000) until getQuestStatus(425034) == "complete" end

player:target_NPC(120252) -- Dormen Blackjaw SureCompleteQuest(425076) -- Assist Pioneer SureAcceptQuest(425077) -- Watch Out For Those Gazes! player:target_NPC(120445) -- Burjnaada Karsht SureAcceptQuest(425038) -- Technique of Capturing Alive
player:target_NPC(120457) -- Eleeya Heisther SureAcceptQuest(425042) -- Need To Focus

CatchMobSetup(106564, 25, 240803, 425038) killForQuest(false, 106564, 425038, 106564, 425077, "CaptureDone") -- Dark Energy Puppet / Watch Out For Those Gazes! / Technique of Capturing Alive ShabbyBag()
killForQuest(false, 106564, 425038, 106564, 425077, "CaptureDone") -- Dark Energy Puppet / Watch Out For Those Gazes! / Technique of Capturing Alive ShabbyBag()
killForQuest(false, 106564, 425038, 106564, 425077, "CaptureDone") -- Dark Energy Puppet / Watch Out For Those Gazes! / Technique of Capturing Alive ShabbyBag()
killForQuest(false, 106564, 425038, 106564, 425077, "CaptureDone") -- Dark Energy Puppet / Watch Out For Those Gazes! / Technique of Capturing Alive ShabbyBag()
killForQuest(false, 106564, 425038, 106564, 425077, "CaptureDone") -- Dark Energy Puppet / Watch Out For Those Gazes! / Technique of Capturing Alive ShabbyBag()
killForQuest(false, 106564, 425038, 106564, 425077, "CaptureDone") -- Dark Energy Puppet / Watch Out For Those Gazes! / Technique of Capturing Alive ShabbyBag()
if getQuestStatus(425038) == "incomplete" or getQuestStatus(425077) == "incomplete" then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("CaptureAlive")) else CatchMobSetup(0, 0, 0, 0) end

player:target_NPC(120252) -- Dormen Blackjaw if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARLOCK then SureCompleteQuest(425077, 1) -- Watch Out For Those Gazes! inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230442) -- Cautionary Cloth Belt elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then SureCompleteQuest(425077, 2) -- Watch Out For Those Gazes! inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230443) -- Cautionary Leather Belt elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_CHAMPION then SureCompleteQuest(425077, 3) -- Watch Out For Those Gazes! inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230444) -- Cautionary Chainmail Belt end SureAcceptQuest(425079) -- Help Sinther

player:target_NPC(120445) -- Burjnaada Karsht SureCompleteQuest(425038, 2) -- Technique of Capturing Alive (Pick reward with highest resale value) player:target_NPC(120446) -- Karkushee Searstove SureAcceptQuest(425037) -- Tool Maintenance Oil SureAcceptQuest(425039) -- Secret Treasure Box
player:target_NPC(120444) -- Reeta Purnash SureAcceptQuest(425036) -- Just Want To Sleep
killForQuest(true, 106565, 425036, 106565, 425037) -- Foul Bat / Just Want To Sleep / Tool Maintenance Oil

if getQuestStatus(425036) == "incomplete" or getQuestStatus(425037) == "incomplete" then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Bats")) end

if getQuestStatus(425039) == "incomplete" then repeat player:target_Object(120378) -- Iron Box yrest(2000) until getQuestStatus(425039) == "complete" end

player:target_NPC(120457) -- Eleeya Heisther if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARLOCK then SureCompleteQuest(425042, 3) -- Need To Focus inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230478) -- Researcher Thinking Cloth Cap elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then SureCompleteQuest(425042, 2) -- Need To Focus inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230479) -- Focused Will Leather Helmet elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_CHAMPION then SureCompleteQuest(425042, 1) -- Need To Focus inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230480) -- Noise Cancelling Helmet end SureAcceptQuest(425043) -- Annihilation Plan

player:target_NPC(120458) -- Mayweather Lichada SureCompleteQuest(425046, 1) -- Eliminate Cold (Have a better cape already) SureAcceptQuest(425051) -- Waiting In The Cave player:mount() __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL")

player:dismount() player:target_NPC(120454) -- Kargee Fusecryst SureCompleteQuest(425051) -- Waiting In The Cave SureAcceptQuest(425045) -- Soldier's Provocation player:target_NPC(120454) -- Kargee Fusecryst ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_423052_1")) -- 'I'm ready!' __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN")
-- Just wait around and kill nearby bats until the timer expires. if getQuestStatus(425045) == "incomplete" then yrest(5000) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Soldier")) end

player:target_NPC(120454) -- Kargee Fusecryst if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARLOCK then SureCompleteQuest(425045, 3) -- Soldier's Provocation inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230487) -- Fearless Armor elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then SureCompleteQuest(425045, 2) -- Soldier's Provocation inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230488) -- Messenger elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_CHAMPION then SureCompleteQuest(425045, 1) -- Soldier's Provocation inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230489) -- Provoker end
__WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") player:mount()

yrest(1000) player:target_NPC(120453) -- Purlani Soulforge SureCompleteQuest(425034) -- Express Dissatisfaction SureAcceptQuest(425035) -- Letter from Ailic SureCompleteQuest(425035, 1) -- Letter from Ailic

player:target_NPC(120435) -- Ivann Forgenail -- The following quest rewards show two stats on the preview, but only STAM when you get it. if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARLOCK then SureCompleteQuest(425029, 3) -- Remembered Face inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230496) -- Memory Shard elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then SureCompleteQuest(425029, 2) -- Remembered Face inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230497) -- Friendship's Reward elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_CHAMPION then SureCompleteQuest(425029, 1) -- Remembered Face inventory:update() inventory:useItem(230498) -- Reminiscence end
player:target_NPC(120358) -- Aynne Goode SureAcceptQuest(425078) -- Request Assistance

player:target_NPC(120449) -- Jerrylin Sharppspade SureAcceptQuest(425047) -- Food Thieves
